actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the Speaker to administer the oath of office to Representative-elect Sala Burton from the State of California.

summary.text: Authorizes the Speaker of the House of Representatives to administer the oath of office to the Honorable Sala Burton of California at Washington, District of Columbia.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the Speaker to administer the oath of office to Representative-elect Sala Burton from the State of California.
